circumstances: On approach to Long Beach, both engines flames out. The pilot attempted an emergency landing when the airplane struck power cables and a fence before coming to rest. All four occupants escaped with minor injuries while the aircraft was damaged beyond repair.
probable_cause:
Engine failure during traffic pattern and subsequent collision with wires/poles due to mismanagement of fuel. The following contributing factors were reported: 
- Fuel starvation, 
- Forced landing off airport on land, 
- Found main fuel tanks empty, 
- Auxiliary tanks nearly full.
